   Viral image
   stated on August 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
   Photos from the movie “Lilo & Stitch” support child sex-trafficking
   conspiracy theories.

See the sources for this fact-check

   In the original version of the 2002 Disney movie "Lilo & Stitch," there’s
   a scene in which Lilo hides from her older sister in the dryer during a
   fight.

In Lilo & Stitch, the scene was edited to show Lilo hiding behind a pizza
   box "in order to prevent children hiding in dryers," the magazine
   reported.

Our Sources

   Facebook post, Aug. 6, 2020

    

   YouTube, Lilo and Stitch: Lilo and Nani’s fight, uploaded March 3, 2018
